name: RelaxingSleepSoundsJurassicSounds
0:
”Alexa, open Jurassic Sounds”
”Alexa, start Jurassic Sounds”
”Alexa, launch Jurassic Sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jurassic sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Admittedly this is not the best audio to fall asleep along with. Yes, the soothing rain recorded in the Amazon in Brazil will help lull you to sleep, and the thunder recorded in Tuscany Italy and across the United States may give you feelings of calm and peace. However, what you don't realize is that dinosaurs are lurking nearby, mainly the majestic t-rex who could let out a bellowing roar at any moment. 

You can also cancel your trial or subscription by saying, "Alexa, ask Jurassic sounds to cancel the subscription," or you can do this in the Amazon app where you manage your subscriptions. 

PAID VERSION:
This skill's paid version gives you higher quality audio, longer audio files, and more variation. Consider supporting my development through these. 

 For more relaxing sleep sounds, please consider some of my other skills:
If you enjoy this Sleep Sound Skill, please check out my others!

You can see more at RelaxingSleepSounds.com, or you can reach out to me at relaxingsleep.alexa@gmail.com.
